physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No complications noted; discharge echocardiogram showed no residual AR.
Moderate AR noted on echocardiogram; patient started having mild shortness of breath with exertion.
Moderate-to-severe AR on echocardiography; increased shortness of breath.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressed from moderate AR to moderate-to-severe AR.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Moderate left ventricular dilatation and global hypokinesis present.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Maximal flow velocity across the SPV was 2.2 m/s, peak transvalvular gradient approximately 19 mm Hg.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild LV hypertrophy without dilatation and normal LV systolic function; aortic root normal size; no AR.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement from preoperative moderate-to-severe AR to no AR with normal LV function.
